source_text: The rate of royalty payable by Sipa to Battmin is 0.6% of the Net Smelter Return from future production.
additional_details: The royalty is granted by Sipa to Battmin (or its nominated Related Body Corporate) as consideration for the transfer of Battmin's 50% interest in the Barbwire Terrace tenements. Sipa has the option to purchase the full royalty back for $600,000.
